body.p: However, Mr Yamada does not agree with:

li.p: the disaggregation of defined benefit cost (see paragraph DO10);
the definition of net interest and remeasurements of the net defined benefit liability (asset) (see paragraphs DO11–DO14); and
the presentation of remeasurements of the net defined benefit liability (asset) in other comprehensive income (see paragraphs DO15–DO17).
